Kiana is taking training in St. Freya HS. At the same time, Bronya got controlled by Anti-entropy abd help Anti-entropy to attack St. Freya HS.
琪亚娜等人于圣芙蕾雅学园接受德丽莎训练。在训练的过程中，布洛妮娅遭到逆熵的控制侵入到圣芙蕾雅学园机密区域，并与外部的逆熵部队接应，对圣芙蕾雅学园展开了大规模的攻击。
時は流れ——キアナたち一行は戦乙女になるべく、聖フレイヤ学園でテレサの訓練を受けていた。しかし、突如ブローニャがネゲントロピーに操られ、機密区域へと侵入をしてしまう。
시간이 흘러——키아나 일행은 전투처녀가 되기 위해,세인트 프레야 학원에서테레사의 훈련을 받고 있었다. 그러나 갑자기브로냐가네겐트로피에 조종당해 기밀 구역으로 침입해 버린다.

Time passed——Kiana and her friends trained under Theresa at St. Freyja Academy to become Valkyries. However, Bronya was suddenly manipulated by Anti-Entropy and broke into a confidential area. (TN: I highly recommend reading Lost Sister S1-3, Phantom Sea Chamber S1-2, Candy House S1, Snow Land S1, Searing Path, and Awaken Nightmare S1 — in that order — before continuing. Unfortunately these main story chapters were limited time events...)

O tempo voa - Kiana e seu grupo foram treinados por Teresa na Academia St. Freya para se tornarem valquírias. No entanto, Bronya é novamente manipulada pela a Anti-Entropia e invade uma área classificada.

Kiana and the others received training from Theresa at St. Freya's Academy. Time flies - Kiana and her group are being trained by Teresa at St. Freya's Academy to become war maidens. Suddenly, however, Bronya is manipulated by negentropy and enters a classified area.
